channel.title: [07] What do you think of their final decision?
channel.description:
I feel this needs a new thread since the other one primarily dealing with the 07 vote is more or less just dealing with issues regarding payment confusion, if a mod feels like it feel free to merge the topics.
[img]http://puu.sh/2aeO8[/img]
So, what are your views? I feel Jagex are finally coming back to their players, or at least the veteran players. I cannot explain how much Jagex have seriously changed my opinion of them this past month or so, they've been incredible. I [b]never[/b] thought Jagex would or could come back and give us something such as this, but they have, and they haven't dragged it out either. They've been completely transparent with us as players and they actually seem very enthusiastic about this themselves. I'm incredibly surprised at their decision to keep it to just the members fee for 6 months, it seems they've taken a whole new look on the RS community. Or at least that's what I think, what about you?

item.title: [07] What do you think of their final decision?
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:14, topic:500894”][quote author=Fails link=topic=619123.msg4247406#msg4247406 date=1362155539]
Yes, I played back then, but I never came across anyone like that. Everyone I played with was in it for the sheer enjoyment.
[/quote]
What are you saying lol? We’re all in it for the sheer enjoyment or we wouldn’t be playing the game…[/quote]
Fails, what are you on about? People made bank crafting nats back in the day, they only grinded rc for that reason: to get rich.

Read full topic

item.title: [07] What do you think of their final decision?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:24, topic:500894”]Ruby: I played for about 30 minutes, that doesn’t mean I don’t watch my friends, which I do. Everyone sees an opportunity to become the richest, best, etc. because it’s basically a ‘new beginning.’ You don’t have to have hours invested in the game to know this. :o

This is just my opinion. You don’t have to try so damn hard to prove me wrong.[/quote]
I’m not trying so damn hard to prove anyone wrong, you were saying it as though it was fact where I can guarantee it wasn’t. If you haven’t gotten the feel for the community then don’t portray false facts.

item.title: [07] What do you think of their final decision?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:20, topic:500894”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=619123.msg4247542#msg4247542 date=1362162946]
What are you saying lol? We’re all in it for the sheer enjoyment or we wouldn’t be playing the game…
[/quote]
No, not everyone is playing for the sheer enjoyment. As of right now, everyone is playing to be the best.[/quote]
No they aren’t and I honestly don’t think you can comment on the matter after only played for 30 minutes as opposed to a lot of members who have agreed with me and myself having racked up upwards of 40 hours playing so far at least. You can’t possibly get the feel for the game and the way the community is acting just because you’ve seen people are proud of their highscores lol

item.title: [07] What do you think of their final decision?
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:2, topic:500894”]When it comes to Jagex, It’s all about money. Think about it, many players were unsatisfied with the new updates and were quitting because of them. They needed something draw players back in, and since everyone, or most everyone, enjoyed the '07 era of RS they thought it could be the solution to all of their problems. They’re taking advantage of us!

This is just my opinion on the matter. :([/quote]

Pretty much this, they saw a great money making opportunity with the low player count and the majority of the RS community wanting an older version of the game.

Read full topic
item.source: [07] What do you think of their final decision?

item.title: [07] What do you think of their final decision?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I wanted the whole shabang.

Modifying the 07 game in a different way than they currently have. I think with the right team it could become 1000x better.

What pServs generally do is take the taspects we like from the real game and put them together and leave out the aspects we don’t like. I think that’s what it should be like - everyones opinion that doesn’t agree with me cause most of them are like ITS MEANTZ TO BE OLDSKOOLZ or LOLZ DONT MAKE IT SLIGHTLY EASIERZZ CUZ ITLL SUPERZ EAZY or THEIR WERE NO UPDATEZ SINCE 2007 THAT ARE WORTH PUTTING INTO THE SERVER etcetc…

Read full topic
item.source: [07] What do you think of their final decision?

item.title: [07] What do you think of their final decision?
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:4, topic:500894”]The benefits with the '07 server are reasonable because technically, we did not hit 480k votes.

When it comes to a business Jagex, It’s all about money.

You can’t always make your customers happy and make money at the same time and vice versa.

Think about it, many players were unsatisfied with the new updates and were quitting because of them.

It’s because people these days are picky as love and rage when they don’t get what they want. Which is why there are so many loveing riots in Falador when the smallest changes happen. Like really, you’re not being forced to play the game.[/quote]

We only hit 449k Votes, Jagex is sorry, They want money thats all, As they said, if the 07 community doesnt keep rising within 6months but downfalls instead, membership will be charged, thats because they make no money within the 6months for everybody renewing membership. I wouldnt play EoC and im not gonna play 07, I hate jagex either way.

Thats my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: [07] What do you think of their final decision?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:10, topic:500894”]RS will never be the same. I say this because everyone has different play-styles now, and they actually know what they’re doing. Way back when, people played for the adventure, not to get rich quick or become #1 on the HS.

Do you understand what I’m (trying) to get at?[/quote]
Did you actually play back then lol? Everyone played to become rich and everyone wanted to be high on the highscores, there’s people who are also in it for questing. If you played you’d realise that, you can’t really have a proper view of it if you’ve only played for 30 minutes but hundreds of people quest and run questing groups, they’re in it for the adventure.

Read full topic

item.title: [07] What do you think of their final decision?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

I’d play the '07 server if I still had membership. I’m just too lazy to go to Wal-Mart or Gamestop even though I’m near both of those everyday on my way to school.

Wasn’t so much directed towards you as it was Fails :o. If you play the 07 servers you’ll realise just how much it is like 07, it’s honestly almost identical. The community is similar also. Very very few EoC people causing disruptions, just a generally brilliant playing environment.

Fails:

I played for about 30 minutes on my friend’s account, but just because the '07 servers are nostalgic doesn’t mean they won’t be ruined. :mad:

Well you said RS will never be the same and in all honesty anyone who has actually played them realises it’s almost identical. I can’t fault it and neither can any of the clan or anyone in the cc

Read full topic
